Reviews.Title: Great piece of equipment
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Cohen
Reviews.Content: I use this little battery pack all the time in my line of work. I am really not sure I could do my job without it. The battery life is great, and it is light enough to carry around from one place to another. I subtracted one start because it frequently turns on by itself while it is in my bag. I arrived at a job site once, and it was dead. The power button should have a shield over it, or just be a little harder to press. Other than that it is a great piece of equipment.

Reviews.Title: Great battery life
Reviews.Author: Gary Pansino
Reviews.Content: A one of a kind product that is rugged and works great.  The battery life was an unexpected bonus.  A bit pricey, but worth it.
